The 30 days of the challenge are themed by the organiser. Day 1's theme is *points*.

![](../assets/images/blog/30daymapchallenge/day01_AntarcticHistoricalLocations.png "Simple map of antarctica with historic sites marked.")

Made as fast as possible to catch up whilst beginning on the fourth day of the challenge using QGIS. I was happy to have plotted anything at all!

Data: [Locations of Antarctic historic sites and monuments from the Polar Data Centre](https://data.bas.ac.uk/full-record.php?id=GB/NERC/BAS/PDC/01431) https://doi.org/10.5285/7a6fddc4-291c-4673-af87-0a040616e812

Backed by coastline from: https://data.bas.ac.uk/full-record.php?id=GB/NERC/BAS/PDC/01391 https://doi.org/10.5285/065B9ABC-1B5A-4FC6-AA57-9052428AA6CA
